nodes.text: The Sanyassa system was located in the in the Moddell subsector, one of the subsectors making up the Inner Zuma Region within the Outer Rim Territories' Zuma sector. The system contained the planet Sanyassa IV, a lawless world that was the homeworld of the Sanyassan species.

The Sanyassa system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by                                                Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square H-16.
